validation_commands: nix develop --command mypy music_commander/db/queries.py music_commander/utils/annex_metadata.py music_commander/commands/sync_metadata.py --strict

source_description: Sync Mixxx library metadata (rating, BPM, color, name, artist, title, album, crates) to git-annex metadata on music files. One-way sync from Mixxx to git-annex, designed for future bidirectional support. Manual CLI command trigger. Default to tracks changed since last sync, with option for full resync or specific files. Always overwrite git-annex metadata with Mixxx values. Research and implement efficient batching to minimize git history bloat.
